runs.comm: short of a length, wide, punched away to square third man for one
short of a length, outside off, left alone by Marsh
length ball into the pads, goes for a leg-bye
short of a length, middle and leg, straightens a touch, beats the inside edge, goes for a leg-bye
short of a length, wide outside off, punched past off
short of a length, outside off, hits the bottom half on the punch
short of a length, middle and leg, Marsh has rocked back to pull this through midwicket for four. Pulls up near the fence but makes it
short of a length, outside off, cuts it nicely but straight to point
another cut but finds the man at point again
fuller, driven straight of mid-off for a single. Kohli puts a dive to his left to save three runs
mid-on is wide, and Finch loves this length ball. He drives on the up, and between the legs of the non-striker Marsh
length ball, angling in, dabbed away for a single
down the wicket, Nehra drags the length back, and Finch gets a single off the soft pull
superb fielding by Pandya. Firstly Marsh has mis-hit this pull over mid-on, and then Pandya gives in the big chase. He puts in the dive at the end of the chase and keeps the ball in
cramps him up on the punch, goes to cover
poor ball by T20 standards. Short of a length, on the pads, and tickled away for four. This is pitched well outside leg
short ball, outside off, Finch has short-armed this wide wide of mid-on for four all along the ground
Finch plays around with the field. The fine leg is up in the circle and he moves across to flick a length ball from outside off past that man at short fine leg
short of a length, at the stumps, steered to third man for one
it is a cruel game this. Finch makes room, Bumrah bounces him, Finch has been beaten comprehensively, but the top edge goes fine for four. back over the keeper's head
short of a length, outside off, pushed to cover-point

excellent cricket everywhere. Slower ball, on a length, just outside off, nearly beats him, but Marsh opens the face late to place it fine, but Dhoni is equal to it and puts in a dive to keep this to a dot
the pace here has surprised everybody. Quicker delivery, around off, seams back in to cut Marsh into two, goes over the stumps, and even Dhoni is surprised by the pace and concedes the bye
short of a length, hits him high on the bat, but they have stolen a single under their nose
slower ball, on a length, around off, hits the inside half of his bat
short of a length, tucked away off the hips, to the right of deep square leg
slight seam back in from around middle and leg, and they still sneak in a leg-bye even though Nehra has had the better of this delivery
short of a length, slightly slower off the pitch, pushed towards midwicket for one
slower short ball, but Finch has played around with the field again. Tucks this around the corner, past short fine leg, for a couple
gets the width. Might have sold Nehra the dummy. He backs away early, Nehra pushes this one wide, and then Finch cuts it between short third man and point for four
short from Bumrah but Marsh likes it short. He has pulled this behind square for four
quick length ball, pushed to mid-on for a quick single
slower ball, a touch too full, Finch likes it, holds the shot back to adjust and chips this over mid-on for four
short and wide, just a touch too quick and he cuts this straight into the ground
half-volley outside off, a foot short of being a yorker, muscled away past mid-off, to his left, for four
short of a length, angling in, worked past short fine leg for one
nice and slow, middle and leg, defended back to Jadeja
makes room, Jadeja shortens the length, cut in front of deep point for two
makes room again, cuts from in front of the stumps, gets a single to deep point

Stop the press. Dhoni has missed a stumping. At his best he completes this blindfolded. Marsh tries the big shot, the ball turns in and goes over the leg stump. For a change he has grabbed at this one. Just the slight extra bounce. I don't remember Dhoni missing such a stumping ever
makes room to cut away for a single again
Finch takes Ashwin on first ball. A big slog sweep that has gone more up than far. Manages to clear deep midwicket by inches
flat, short of a length, punched to cover
Ashwin predicts Finch will back away and fires one down the leg side. Concedes a leg-side wide as Finch stands his ground, and Dhoni concedes the bye
down the wicket to chip this away for one  towards long-on
Finch backs away this time, gets a bottom edge on the cut, takes a single to short fine leg
short of a length, into the pads, punched away into the leg side
short of a length but not short enough to be pulled as Finch discovers. The mis-hit goes straight to midwicket but bounces three times before reaching the man
flat delivery, punched down to long-on for one

Yadav has nearly taken a blinder but this will count as a drop in this age. Finch has mis-hit this pull towards deep midwicket. Yadav is running not just to his left but also back. He goes airborne, gets both hands to the ball but ends up parrying it over the rope
swept away from outside off for a single to deep midwicket
punched down to long-on for one
flat length ball, Finch looks for the cut, gets a bottom edge as the cut is not on
short of a length, into the pads, punched down to long-on
short of a length, punched down to long-on for a single again
Finch backs away, Ashwin follows him, cramps him up, draws a dot

Rishi Dhawan is well inside the fence. Finch is down the wicket, beaten in the flight, and drop-kicks it towards deep square leg. Dhawan is getting lobbed and he is running back but can't get to the ball
and now Shikhar Dhawan drops one. This has been slog-swept straight into the lap of Shikhar Dhawan at deep midwicket. He has let this drop out of his hands. A real sitter
wide, too far wide outside off

and finally India hold on to a catch. Marsh jumps out of his crease, gets too close to the pitch of the ball, and doesn't get the elevation he wants when looking to hit over long-on. Pandya takes the catch there. Even this one nearly slips out of the finger tips
looks to work this offbreak to leg, gets a leading edge towards long-off for one
short of a length, outside off, punched to deep cover for one
short, slower outside off, tucked away past short fine leg for two
nearly a run-out. Finch cuts this straight to Jadeja at point, takes off the single, and then gives up because Jadeja has got to this quickly. He fails with the direct hit, though
slower ball, wide outside off, bottom-edged towards the keeper, but on the bounce

Pandya is doing everything for India right now. Slower ball, wide outside off. Lynn wants a replay of that huge six from Adelaide as soon as he sees a length ball, but this is slightly off pace, and takes a massive top edge towards short third man. Dhoni calls for it, gets rid of his hat, and takes the swirling ball cleanly
short of a length, outside off, beats him on the cut with a skiddy delivery
short of a length, on off, pushed to extra cover for one
full, really full, in the block hole, dug out back to him
full, middle and leg, Finch looks to go to cover, the ball doesn't turn, and goes to long-on off the inside half of the bat

MCG has gone mad. Yuvraj has got a wicket. Maxwell is gone. The quick Dhoni stumping is back. Clever bowling from Yuvraj. Maxwell gives him the charge, Yuvraj slips in the quicker wider one. Maxwell can't reach it, and the lightning quick work from Dhoni sends him back
full, into the pads, punched to long-on for one
on a length, on off, pushed to point
is this the luck Australia need? A length ball outside off, Watson pushes at it, gets a regulation edge that beats third man to his left
this time he steers a shortish ball to third man for one
short of a length, middle and leg, punched to deep midwicket for one
short, down the leg side, beats the pull, but will be called a wide
slower ball, short of a length, Watson goes to cut, but the lack of pace means he has hit this back to the bowler
lovely touch. The third man has come up, and he steers a shortish delivery between the short third man and backward point. It races away
and short he bowls. This outside off so it cannot be pulled, but Watson has punched this past point for a couple
no pace, no room, Finch cuts this from in front of the stumps, but gets no timing. Finds the man at point
tries the big drive down the ground, gets a thick inside edge to long-on
really full, in the block hole, a dive from Ashwin keeps them down to a dot. That dive from Ashwin notwithstanding this was an easy single given up by Australia
full, really full, drilled right back to Yuvraj
on a length, middle and leg, driven to long-on
full, middle and leg, bunted into the leg side for a two. Jadeja is quick and surprises them a little, but the batsmen make it eventually

he has Malinaged this round arm. Would have been a wide had Watson not swept this hard and in the air towards Yadav at deep square leg. Yadav goes for the catch, but it reaches him on the half-volley. He has got his body behind it, and keeps them down to just two. This is good fielding

if Yadav's fielding last ball was good, this is nothing short of sensational. Watson has absolutely drilled this right back at the umpire's head. All eyes on the ducking umpire and the boundary but Jadeja gets both his hands in the air and takes this fuss free. It takes a brave man and an excellent fielder. Jadeja is both. Watson is impressed with Jadeja's effort. He is bemused but he is impressed
driven to long-on for one
low full toss, driven hard to long-off for one
another single down the ground
another roundarm delivery. This is shortish, quick and outside off, Finch makes room, and then leaves it alone. Perhaps not short enough to be cutting
on a length, offbreak, hit straight to short extra cover

pushed to extra cover again but Finch takes the risk with his hamstring. And he is gone. Wade has failed to place the ball, put the pressure on Finch, who has run himself him out. Jadeja's throw is wide, but the hamstrung Finch is so short of his crease he has been run out. Finch run out Jadeja bowled Wade
dropped into the leg side for a single. Wade is in trouble, but Yuvraj has got himself into a tangle and lets him take the single
big hit from Wade, gets a soft outside edge for a single to short third man
flatter delivery, Faulkner looks to go behind square on the off side, and is beaten by the skidding delivery
Ashwin dives to his right, and as he gets a bad bounce, he bunts it towards short midwicket. Saves one run, and also keeps Wade on strike
down the wicket to get a single to deep midwicket
short of a length, punched to deep point for one
this is a wide down the leg side until Wade sweeps it straight to short fine leg for a single
Faulkner flickers. Takes a flat length ball from outside off and slogs it over midwicket for a six. They will need five more such hits if they are to win, though
this will do for Australia. Full and straight, nearly a yorker, and off the inside edge it goes for a couple

a freak stumping to make up for the one he missed earlier in the evening? Wide round-arm delivery, Faulkner looks for the big slog, inside-edges it into Dhoni's pads, and the ricochet goes on to the stumps. The third umpire is brought in, and the replay from square on shows his back foot has dragged out of the crease. Dhoni's gloves are close to the stumps when the ball hits the wicket, but the third umpire seems convinced it is not the gloves whodunnit. He doesn't ask for another replay. And rightly so
makes room to push one into the off side for one
carrom ball? No room, defended back to him
swept to fin e leg for one
down the wicket tp chip this length ball over midwicket for a six. Too late? Too little?
cleverly bowled by Ashwin. Sees Wade back away and bowls a quick one just inside the tram line. The little Wade can't reach it. Is beaten
same line wide outside off but this time slower in the air. Wade just toe-ends this back to Ashwin
full and wide, driven to long-on for one
yorker, on off, dug out for a single to extra cover
low full toss, will go for just the single to long-off
looks to ramp but gets just the single to short fine leg
full, into the pads, chipped away for a single
low full toss, ends a superb over with a sixth single off it
full, yorker, dug out to long-off for a single
and the traditional Bumrah yorker. In each of his three matches Bumrah has bowled a batsman with a yorker. This is swift, and aimed at the base of the middle stump. Too good for hastings
tries the short-ball variation... wide down the leg side
slower short ball, beats Tye's swpie
nearly a yorker, but also nearly a half-volley. Tye scorches this past long-off for four
quick yorker, under his bat and just outside off
and Bumrah finishes it off with a full ball. Not a yorker, but Tye is late onto it, and lets is squeeze under his bat. The off stump is pegged back
